pullRequest.title: Add Application resource for Google Cloud Marketplace
pullRequest.bodyText:
Detailed description:

Add Application custom resource
Add a custom values.yaml with extraneous workloads disabled for use in Marketplace
Fix hardcoded namespace in Grafana ingress (upstream change)
Fix Grafana ConfigMap, middleware and notes being enabled when Grafana is disabled
Fix middleware installed when ingress disabled
Fix Traefik monitoring all namespaces

Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Fixes #735
Special notes for your reviewer:
Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated

commit.message:
Add Application resource for Google Cloud Marketplace

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+{{- if .Values.applicationResource.enabled -}}
+apiVersion: app.k8s.io/v1beta1
+kind: Application
+metadata:
+  annotations:
+    kubernetes-engine.cloud.google.com/icon: data:image/png;base64,{{ .Files.Get "logo.png" | b64enc }}
+    marketplace.cloud.google.com/deploy-info: |-
+      {
+        partner_id: {{ .Values.applicationResource.partnerId | quote }},
+        partner_name: {{ .Values.applicationResource.partnerName | quote }},
+        product_id: {{ .Values.applicationResource.productId | quote }}
+      }
+  labels:
+    {{- include "hedera-mirror.labels" . | nindent 4 }}
+  name: {{ include "hedera-mirror.fullname" . }}
+  namespace: {{ include "hedera-mirror.namespace" . }}
+spec:
+  selector:
+    matchLabels:
+      {{- include "hedera-mirror.selectorLabels" . | nindent 6 }}
+  addOwnerRef: true
+  componentKinds:
+  - group: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+  - group: apps/v1
+    kind: Deployment
+  - group: networking.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: NetworkPolicy
+  - group: v1
+    kind: Pod
+  - group: policy/v1beta1
+    kind: PodDisruptionBudget
+  - apiVersion: scheduling.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: PriorityClass
+  - group: v1
+    kind: Secret
+  - group: v1
+    kind: Service
+  - group: apps/v1
+    kind: StatefulSet
+  descriptor:
+    description: Hedera Mirror Node mirrors transaction data from Hedera nodes and serves it via GRPC and REST APIs
+    icons:
+      - src: https://s3.amazonaws.com/hedera-com/hedera_hashgraph.png
+        type: image/png
+        size: 547x166
+    keywords:
+      - blockchain
+      - dtl
+      - hashgraph
+      - mirror
